name: lru-map
description: An ES6-y Map that evicts entries with an LRU policy

scripts.coffee-jshint: git ls-files | grep "\.coffee$" | xargs node_modules/.bin/coffee-jshint -o node,mocha,loopfunc
scripts.lint: npm run coffeelint && npm run coffee-jshint
scripts.coverage: node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --reporter html-cov --require coverage/init.js --recursive test > coverage/coverage.html && xdg-open coverage/coverage.html
scripts.checkcov: npm run check && npm run coverage
scripts.check: npm run test && npm run lint

author: Ben Chociej <ben@chociej.io>
